signIn.enterPass: Please enter your password to continue

passForgot.description: To recover the password, you need to reset all accounts, set a new password, import each account from the Seed phrase or via Private key.
passForgot.descriptionExchange: You are about to delete all of your Waves.Exchange accounts from this device. This action will not affect your Waves DEX accounts.
passForgot.importantDesc: If you have not saved the Seed phrase or Private key, then you will not be able to recover access to your account.
passForgot.importantDescEx: This action is irreversible! If you have not saved the Seed phrase or private key, then you will not be able to recover access to your Waves.Exchange accounts.
passForgot.importantDescExchange: This action is irreversible! If you have not saved the Seed phrase or private key, then you will not be able to recover access to your Waves.Exchange accounts.

password.overwriteDescription: Overwrite all Waves.Exchange accounts on this device
